page.title: 08FARMING
page.content:
grown on contract,20 acres of hay and 20 acres of grass for cattle. The cattle, which are Pure Bred Black Orkney, are fattened and sold to the local butcher .
Castle Mains which is 500 acres,has been owned by the Simpson family for four generations.It is mainly arable, growing wheat,barley,potatoes and peas to sell to merchants. The farm also has 100 cattle for fattening (Hereford and Friesian ) which are sold in Edinburgh. There are 3 workers on the farm , a number vastly decreased from 20 years ago.The machinery owned by the farm consists of 6 tractors,a forklift and a combine-harvester.
Saltcoats Farm is leased from Luffness Estate by Mr.Trainer. (cont page 9)
